title: Google\Cloud\Translate\V3\GlossaryInputConfig
name: GlossaryInputConfig
description:
Input configuration for glossaries.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.translation.v3.GlossaryInputConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.gcs_source
params.description: Required. Google Cloud Storage location of glossary data. File format is determined based on the filename extension. API returns [google.rpc.Code.INVALID_ARGUMENT] for unsupported URI-s and file formats. Wildcards are not allowed. This must be a single file in one of the following formats: For unidirectional glossaries: - TSV/CSV (.tsv/.csv): 2 column file, tab- or comma-separated. The first column is source text. The second column is target text. The file must not contain headers. That is, the first row is data, not column names. - TMX (.tmx): TMX file with parallel data defining source/target term pairs. For equivalent term sets glossaries: - CSV (.csv): Multi-column CSV file defining equivalent glossary terms in multiple languages. The format is defined for Google Translation Toolkit and documented in Use a glossary.

methods.name: getGcsSource
methods.description:
Required. Google Cloud Storage location of glossary data.

File format is determined based on the filename extension. API returns [google.rpc.Code.INVALID_ARGUMENT] for unsupported URI-s and file formats. Wildcards are not allowed. This must be a single file in one of the following formats: For unidirectional glossaries:

  • TSV/CSV (.tsv/.csv): 2 column file, tab- or comma-separated. The first column is source text. The second column is target text. The file must not contain headers. That is, the first row is data, not column names.
  • TMX (.tmx): TMX file with parallel data defining source/target term pairs. For equivalent term sets glossaries:
  • CSV (.csv): Multi-column CSV file defining equivalent glossary terms in multiple languages. The format is defined for Google Translation Toolkit and documented in Use a glossary.

Generated from protobuf field .google.cloud.translation.v3.GcsSource gcs_source = 1;
